### __Lab Schedule__
__Week 1__</br>
- Sign up for an XSEDE account [here](https://www.xsede.org/web/xup/my-xsede?p_p_id=58&p_p_lifecycle=0&p_p_state=maximized&p_p_mode=view&_58_struts_action=%2Flogin%2Fcreate_account)</br>
- Download putty terminal (for windows machines only!) [here](https://www.chiark.greenend.org.uk/~sgtatham/putty/latest.html)</br>
- [Command line bootcamp](http://rik.smith-unna.com/command_line_bootcamp/): You can (and should) be working on this from you personal laptop.</br>

__Week 2__</br>
- Log in to [Jetstream](https://use.jetstream-cloud.org/). Here is some [info about it](https://iujetstream.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/JWT/pages/17465367/System+Overview).</br>
- [Setting up your Jetstream VM](usingssh.html) for mac users</br>
- [Setting up your Jetstream VM](usingssh_windows.html) for windows users</br>
- [Launch a Jetstream instance](jetstream.html)</br>
- [Connect to a Jetstream instance](connect.html)</br>
